main.name: Giga
main.description: currentrly employed by Thomson Reuters where i push pixels, shuffle data and slap my keyboard until everything works.
main.bio: I am an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, and a passion for coding. I enjoy using my skills to contribute to the exciting technological advances that happen every day at Thomson Reuters. Outside of work I am an avid fisherman, and love to play chess. I dream of being able to take my work with me while travelling the world.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: This are the skills that I have experience with

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: As a member of big and talented team, I am working on a Global Trade solution software. This currently consists of a .Net/Web Forms (migrating to Angular) and SQL Servers (migrating to AWS).

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Created site layout and user inteface using HTML and CSS best practices, Implemented and refactored web pages. Maintained Database. Created web charts for data visualization.

work.title: Software Intern
work.description: Passed various trainings including C#, Java, SQL/PLSQL, Design Patterns. Learnt business logic, starting from daily operations to system structure.

testimonials.text: I have had the opportunity to work with Giga on multiple occasions which has always been a pleasure. He is driven and motivated with a consistently positive attitude. Giga excels at communicating with others and is always willing to work hard until he solves the problem at hand.
That Giga Mghebrishvili must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met!
